long_description: With a built-in pressure gauge for accurate inflation, the Topeak Mini Dual DXG Pump works well on the road or on the trail. SmartHead(TM) works with both Presta and Schrader valves without swapping heads. Dual-action pumping doubles volume with each stroke and inflates to 120 psi. Handle with soft plastic Kraton grip provides great comfort while pumping. The Topeak Mini Dual DXG Pump comes with a side mount bracket.
short_description: With a built-in pressure gauge for accurate inflation, the Topeak Mini Dual DXG Pump works well on the road or on the trail.
